participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and sociable, loves exploring new culinary experiences.
participant_1.background: Hey there, I'm 23 and I love food. I have been traveling the world for a year. I have been trying all types of food everywhere I go. I also like to cook, but I'm not very good at it. I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it.

participant_2.name: Rachel
participant_2.personality: Intellectual and reflective, values knowledge and personal growth.
participant_2.background: I read twenty books a year. I only eat kosher. I never broke a bone in my body ever in my life. I was raised in a single parent household.

content.text: When my processes are killed and my database is deleted.
